name: lib/__tests__/ShopifyAPITest.js
lib/dispatcher/APIDispatcher.js
lib/dispatcher/__tests__/APIDispatcherTest.js
lib/resources/Base.js
ResourceQuery
description:
An object representing a resource query.

Can be one of the following:
  * `number`, `string` - Assumes the value is a resource id
  * `object`           - Will be converted to a query string

name: Base
description:
A base class for API resources. This class is meant to be subclassed and have it's `apiMethods` method overridden to
include all methods that should be made available to consumers.

name: constructor
description:
Using the supplied `resourceName`, this constructor will generate the singular and plural names for this resource
which will be used to infer the merge and clear actions to be dispatched.

params.name: resourceName
params.description: The singular name for the resource (e.g. `product`)

name: apiMethods
description: An array of methods to be exposed via {@link APIProxy}

return.description: The names of all methods to be made available

name: fetch
description: Performs a GET request for the specified query.

name: clear
description: Dispatches the clear action for this resource. The action will be handled by the appropriate store.

name: urlFor

return.description: The resource URL for the specified query

name: lib/resources/Order.js
Order
description: The Order resource

return.description: The names of all methods to be made available

name: fetchAuthorized
description: Fetch authorized orders from the API

name: fetchAllSince
description: Fetch all orders that were created after the specified order

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the reference order

name: lib/resources/Product.js
Product
description: The Product resource

return.description: The names of all methods to be made available

name: fetchByCollection
description: Fetch products in the specified collection

name: fetchAllSince
description: Fetch all products created after the specified product

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the reference product

name: lib/resources/Session.js
Session
description: The Session resource

return.description: The names of all methods to be made available

name: init
description: Dispatches the SET_SESSION event to the store

params.name: domain
params.description: The shop's domain (with or without the `.myshopify.com` suffix)

params.name: token
params.description: The API token to be used

Shop
description: The Shop resource

lib/utilities/WebAPI.js
SuccessfulRequestCallback
description: A method signature for resolved request promises

name: FailedRequestCallback
description: A method signature for rejected request promises

name: RequestPromise
description: A {@link Promise} that resolves with a {@link SuccessfulRequestCallback} and rejects with a {@link FailedRequestCallback}

name: WebAPI
description:
A helper class for working with the REST API.

In all cases, no attempt is made to trap errors. {@link RequestPromise}s are returned from each method. It's up to the
caller to handle rejection.

name: get
description: Performs a GET request for the given URL and options

params.name: options
params.description: options to pass along to the fetch call
